country.text: No zone could be found for the domain you provided in your request
The record id must be an integer
The domain type "@type@" is invalid, it must be one of the following: NATIVE, MASTER, SLAVE, SUPERSLAVE
The record type "@type@" is invalid, it must be one of the following: SOA, NS, MX, A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT, PTR, HWINFO, SRV, NAPTR
